{"parsed":{"_id":"content:3. letters:letters:letter_47.txt","body":"[ A letter to a commissioner of a province. It could not be ascertained as to whom it was \naddressed. ]I have been given to understand that you have taken possession of State-lands and that you \nhave not only brought them under personal use but you have misappropriated State treasury \nalso. Will you immediately send the detailed accounts (about both the items)? Remember that \nthe reckoning of Allah is far more severe than any audit which man can carry out."},"hash":"hbPx924w2t"}
